hero.heading: Carriage House
hero.copy: Carriage house styles bring authentic historical looks into the modern world. From looks that replicate authentic barn-style doors to more simple, yet refined carriage house styling.
hero.direction: What style of garage door do you want?

inspiration.heading: Historic style with today’s technology.
copy: Carriage house doors offer gorgeously crafted decorative options for that old-fashioned, swing-open look, with the technology and functionality you expect from a modern garage door.

large.alt: Pella Wood Carriage Garage Door Gray

next.heading: Next, let’s talk about contemporary garage doors.
next.copy: Bring the modern industrial look to your garage door with these sleek designs.
